long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Storycards converts web content into concise audio summaries, perfect for sharing or saving for later

- Capture key takeaways on anything you see on the web
- Consume bite-sized information anytime, anywhere
- Enjoy content in a new, convenient format
